column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=FM : Loving a baseball team is having to put up with the imperfections , the routine of what kind of mood is it going to be today .
#Text=It does n't come down to whether we are going to win or lose , it comes down to : is the player going to perform this way ?
#Text=Or , is the pitcher going to be ambivalent ?
#Text=Am I even going to have enough strength to watch this game ?
#Text=Am I going to wash my hands ?
#Text=Am I going to lay in bed all day ?
#Text=What am I going to do ?
#Text=The game becomes a reflection of true life in that way .
#Text=DS : The difference is that you know what to expect from the players on the Mets .
#Text=They have defined roles and there is some certitude .
#Text=With women , as the players change you do n't know what they are going to do ; whereas in baseball the players have roles and you know what to expect of them .
#Text=FM : It 's a dangerous proposition being any fan , but particularly a Mets fan , because you are going to have to accept you will fall in love with imperfection .
#Text=When you fall in love with a woman , you are accepting them for all their flaws , those elements that make them human , worts and all .
#Text=And I accept my team worts and all .
#Text=They have given me a great deal of joy , a great deal of entertainment , exhilaration , and a hell of a lot of pain like in any fan .
#Text=This is n't the Brady Bunch , this is n't Leave it to Beaver .
#Text=Few things are , if anything .
#Text=DS : You were the recipient of the 1993 Allen Ginsberg Poetry Award .
#Text=In 1996 I met Ginsberg at the Naropa Institute in Boulder .
#Text=I asked him about NAMBLA , the North American Man/Boy Love Association .
#Text=He told me to follow him into the bathroom .

#Text=As I stood there he peed and told me he was n't for having sex with children , but that he thought that age-of-consent laws were outdated , that he knew what he wanted when he was fifteen and that he thought everyone does at that age .
#Text=He said he was n't for sex with children , but that it should not be illegal to have sex at that age .
#Text=When you accepted the Ginsberg award , did you have an issue with some of his political stances ?
#Text=FM : I was too young at the time to realize what he thought .
#Text=I never knew what went on behind closed doors with Allen , and aside from meeting him a few times , I never knew him on a personal level .
#Text=I accepted the nomination , like young people do each year , because of his poetry , not because of his politics .
#Text=I was proud .
#Text=That is what the award was designed for .
#Text=There are laws in this country for a reason , to protect children and to protect people from predators .
#Text=Whether Allen was a predator or not , I do n't have any idea .
